snippet: “The Islands of Benoît Mandelbrot,” at Focus Gallery, is a heady, compact exhibition about the relationship between abstract reasoning and visual imagination.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibit The Islands of Benoit Mandelbrot: Fractals, Chaos and the Materiality of Thinking, featuring materials by the mathematician Benoit Mandelbrot, at Focus Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “The Islands of Benoît Mandelbrot,” at Focus Gallery, is a heady, compact exhibition about the relationship between abstract reasoning and visual imagination.
